Detailed Description

Manages the SP38Interface to make a simulation and extracts information about that. Any information about the simulation are exposed trough its methods. Enforces some constraints about schedule like minimum green time, maximum red time and inter green time.

Definition at line 21 of file SP38Simulation.hh.

Will the optimisation run forever (or until you ctrl+c it) ?

sets maximum connect tries (will be used every simulation starting)

int SP38::SP38Simulation::getMinimalActivationTime ( Intersection *  i  ) 

Gets the minimal time needed to have one valid green interval. It assumes you will need some yellow time, inter green interval and minimum green time. It rounds things to fit into a multiple of the time step size.

Parameters:
the intersection
